action-managewiki-core: manage core settings for this wiki
action-managewiki-extensions: enable and disable extensions for this wiki
action-managewiki-namespaces: create, delete, and manage namespaces for this wiki
action-managewiki-permissions: create, delete, and manage user groups on this wiki
action-managewiki-settings: manage advanced settings for this wiki
apihelp-modifyserver-param-wiki: The ID of the wiki to modify the server name for.
apihelp-query+wikiconfig-paramvalue-prop: Check if the wiki is marked as closed
View which extensions are enabled on the wiki
Check if the wiki is marked as inactive
Check if the wiki is exempt from inactivity
View the permissions of these user groups
Check if the wiki is marked as private
View the settings of the wiki
View the sitename of the wiki
apihelp-query+wikiconfig-summary: View sitename, inactive, inactive-exempt, closed, private, extensions, settings and permissions for the specified wiki.
apiwarn-wikiconfig-nopermission: You are not allowed to view the configuration for wiki '$1'.
log-description-managewiki: This log tracks all changes to this wiki's settings through ManageWiki.
logentry-managewiki-rights: $1 {{GENDER:$2|changed}} group metadata for $3: added rights $4; removed rights $5; added addgroups $6; removed addgroups $7; added removegroups $8; removed removegroups $9; added addgroupstoself $10; removed addgroupstoself $11; added removegroupsfromself $12; removed removegroupsfromself $13; modified autopromotion ($14)
logentry-managewiki-rights-reset: $1 {{GENDER:$2|reset}} group permissions to the defaults for "$4"
logentry-managewiki-settings-reset: $1 {{GENDER:$2|reset}} the settings to the defaults for "$4"
managewiki-core-info: Insert the database name of the wiki you wish to view core configuration for.
managewiki-desc: Allows users to manage their wiki's configuration with ease through a web interface.
managewiki-disabled: This "$1" module has not been enabled on this wiki and cannot be used.
managewiki-error-conflict: The extension "$1" cannot be enabled because it conflicts with $2.
managewiki-error-emptygroup: You cannot create a group without any permissions assigned.
managewiki-error-install: The extension "$1" failed to be enabled. If this keeps occurring, please
managewiki-error-nopermission: You may view this wiki's configuration but you do not have permission to edit it.
managewiki-error-nopermission-remote: You are remotely viewing a wiki's configuration. If you are a wiki operator, please navigate to your wiki to modify its configuration. You may not edit it from here.
managewiki-error-requirements: The extension "$1" cannot be enabled because it fails to meet its requirements.
managewiki-extension-settings: Manage available configuration options for this extension
managewiki-header-core:
You can manage this wiki's core settings (such as the name and language) from this panel. Greyed out options may only be changed by farm operators. Once done, click 'Save' and your preferences will reflect in a few seconds.

You may manage additional settings such as logo and more at [[Special:ManageWiki/settings]].
managewiki-header-core-view:
You may view this wiki's core settings from this panel but '''you do not have permission to change them'''.

You may view additional settings such as logo and more at [[Special:ManageWiki/settings]].
managewiki-header-extensions:
You may manage this wiki's extensions and skins from this panel. This panel reflects all available extensions and skins. If you do not see the extension or skin you need, please contact your system administrator.

Once done, click 'Save' and your extension or skin will be installed in a few seconds.
managewiki-header-extensions-view: You may view this wiki's extensions and skins from this panel but '''you do not have permission to manage them'''. If you need an extension or skin enabled, please contact this wiki's operators.
managewiki-header-namespaces: You may manage this wiki's namespace settings from this panel. Some settings will only reflect once you enable an extension. Consult MediaWiki documenation for further information. Once done, click 'Save' and your preferences will reflect in a few seconds.
managewiki-header-namespaces-view: You may view this wiki's namespace settings from this panel but '''you do not have permission to change them'''. Contact wiki operators if you need further assistance.
managewiki-header-permissions:
You may manage this wiki's user group settings from this panel (such as permissions, group assignments and autopromotion). Please read the documentation very carefully and do not delete groups brazenly or your wiki may break. Once done, click 'Save' and your preferences will reflect in a few seconds.

Not all permissions may be assignable. Certain user permissions may be reserved only for farm operators. Contact your farm if you do not find certain permissions.
managewiki-header-permissions-view: You may view this wiki's user group settings from this panel (such as permissions, group assignments and autopromotion) but '''you do not have permission to change them'''. Contact wiki operators if you need further assistance.
managewiki-header-settings:
You may manage this wiki's settings (such as logo, styling, and more) from this panel. Be careful! Make sure to carefully read setting descriptions and do not toggle random settings indiscriminately unless you understand what it does. Once done, click 'Save' and your preferences will reflect in a few seconds. 

Greyed out options may only be changed by farm operators. You may manage core settings such as wiki name and language at [[Special:ManageWiki/core]].
managewiki-header-settings-view:
You may view this wiki's settings (such as logo, styling, and more) from this panel but '''you do not have permission to change them'''.

Additional core settings such as wiki name and language are available at [[Special:ManageWiki/core]].
managewiki-invalid-database: $1 is an invalid database. Given by $$2.
managewiki-label-inactive-exempt-reason: Select the reason for this exemption from inactivity.
managewiki-mwlocked: This wiki has had its ability to use ManageWiki restricted.
managewiki-namespace-conflicts: The namespace "$1" already exists and cannot be modified.
managewiki-namespaces-create-info: Use the field below to create a new namespace.
managewiki-namespaces-select-info: Below is a list of all the namespaces that exist on this wiki. Use the dropdown below to select a namespace you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
managewiki-ns-invalidid: Namespace IDs must be an even integer to edit through ManageWiki.
managewiki-permissions-assigned: The below user rights are currently assigned to this user group.
managewiki-permissions-autopromote: Below you can manage autopromotion of users to this group. Note that if a user matches the criteria you set below, they will inherit all permissions of this group and you can not remove them from this group under any circumstance unless you select promoting them once before they meet the criteria.
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-age: Must have been a user for the following number of days
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-conds: For a user to be promoted...
...none of the conditions must be met
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-editc: Must have made the following number of edits
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-group: Must be a member of the following groups
managewiki-permissions-create-info: Use the field below to create a new user group on this wiki.
managewiki-permissions-group: Below you can allow how this user group can assign/unassign other user groups.
managewiki-permissions-group-disallowed: The group you attempted to create is not allowed. Please select a different name and try again.
managewiki-permissions-select-info: Below is a list of all the groups that exist on this wiki. Use the dropdown below to select a group you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
managewiki-permissions-unassigned: The user rights below are currently not assigned to this user group:
managewiki-toggle-forcesidebar: Force the display of ManageWiki links in the sidebar.
managewiki-unavailable-notcentralwiki: This page is unavailable on this wiki. Please visit your farm's central wiki to use this page.
managewiki-warning-changes:
You've made changes to ManageWiki that have not been saved yet.
If you leave this page without clicking "$1" your ManageWiki changes will not be updated.
managewikidefaults-creategroup-info: Use the field below to create a user group which will be automatically created on new wikis from now on.
managewikidefaults-resetcache-header: This option allows you to reset this wiki's CreateWiki cache. This is useful in some cases when settings changes are not being propagated correctly.
managewikidefaults-resetgroups-header:
This option allows you to reset this wiki's user groups settings to the defaults defined in Special:ManageWikiDefaults on the central wiki. This option will not reset groups defined manually.

Please proceed with caution when using this option.
managewikidefaults-resetgroups-title: Reset this wiki's groups to the defaults
managewikidefaults-resetsettings-header: This option resets this wiki's configuration to the defaults, discarding all settings set through [[Special:ManageWiki/settings]]. Core settings, extensions, namespaces, and user groups are not affected.
managewikidefaults-resetsettings-title: Reset this wiki's settings to the defaults
managewikidefaults-selectgroup-info: Below is a list of groups that are automatically created on new wikis. Use the dropdown below to select a group you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
namespaces-aliases: Add all undefined namespaces which should redirect to this one.
namespaces-content: Does this namespace contain main wiki material (content)?
namespaces-contentmodel: What should this namespace's content model be?
namespaces-delete-checkbox: Checking this box will cause this namespace to be deleted
namespaces-migrate-to: If this namespace is deleted, what namespace should pages on this namespace be moved to?
namespaces-protection: Which userright should be needed to edit this namespace?
namespaces-search: Should this namespace be searchable by default?
namespaces-subpages: Should this namespace have subpages enabled?
right-managewiki-core: Manage core settings for this wiki
right-managewiki-extensions: Enable and disable extensions for this wiki
right-managewiki-namespaces: Create, delete, and manage namespaces for this wiki
right-managewiki-permissions: Create, delete, and manage user groups on this wiki
right-managewiki-settings: Manage advanced settings for this wiki
right-remotewiki: Remotely manage a wiki's core settings
